Entries.DialogueText: 哼……要跟这些新面孔打交道还真是不爽啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哼……要跟这些新面孔打交道还真是不爽啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 对了，我叫乔治。赶紧给我消失……哼。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对了，我叫乔治。赶紧给我消失……哼。

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……（喝了一口）……啊……这是我妈妈做的金枪鱼砂锅的味道！好喝！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……（喝了一口）……啊……这是我妈妈做的金枪鱼砂锅的味道！好喝！

Entries.DialogueText: 这是什么？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这是什么？

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……所以你是先按了这个按键？这个按键是用来做什么的？嗯……（咕哝）
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……所以你是先按了这个按键？这个按键是用来做什么的？嗯……（咕哝）

Entries.DialogueText: 哈哈！嗯，看看这个！是新的频道！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哈哈！嗯，看看这个！是新的频道！

Entries.DialogueText: 给，拿着这个。这是我当年挖矿的时候发现的一块石头。四十年来，它一直冰凉冰凉的，还发着蓝光，很有意思。跟魔法一样！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 给，拿着这个。这是我当年挖矿的时候发现的一块石头。四十年来，它一直冰凉冰凉的，还发着蓝光，很有意思。跟魔法一样！

Entries.DialogueText: 亲爱的，没事的，没事的……别操心了。%noturn
Entries.DisplayPattern: 亲爱的，没事的，没事的……别操心了。

Entries.DialogueText: 即使有毒，我当初在煤矿里待一分钟，吸到的毒气都比这多……我不还是活得好好的！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 即使有毒，我当初在煤矿里待一分钟，吸到的毒气都比这多……我不还是活得好好的！

Entries.DialogueText: 这场雨下完就要除草，年轻人有得好忙了……嘿嘿…… {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这场雨下完就要除草，年轻人有得好忙了……嘿嘿……

Entries.DialogueText: 谢谢你换掉那辆破烂不堪的旧拖车……新房子更好看了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢谢你换掉那辆破烂不堪的旧拖车……新房子更好看了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你知道吗，我敢确信，这也会增加我们房产的价值！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你知道吗，我敢确信，这也会增加我们房产的价值！

Entries.DialogueText: 哎哟……那个新房子有点遮挡我的河景……但它肯定比潘姆原来住的那个老锡罐好看。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎哟……那个新房子有点遮挡我的河景……但它肯定比潘姆原来住的那个老锡罐好看。

Entries.DialogueText: 你想跟我这样的老头去看电影？……唔……好吧。我们到时候见。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你想跟我这样的老头去看电影？……唔……好吧。我们到时候见。

Entries.DialogueText: 上周之后那个浣熊就再也没来了！不知道你干了什么。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 上周之后那个浣熊就再也没来了！不知道你干了什么。

Entries.DialogueText: 你看我可能跟不上时代，但你要是到我这个年纪，就能对人生看得透彻了。这就叫“智慧”。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你看我可能跟不上时代，但你要是到我这个年纪，就能对人生看得透彻了。这就叫“智慧”。

Entries.DialogueText: 年轻人根本看不清大局。他们哪来这个水平？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 年轻人根本看不清大局。他们哪来这个水平？

Entries.DialogueText: 我入土之前让我当个曾爷爷，你看行不行？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我入土之前让我当个曾爷爷，你看行不行？

Entries.DialogueText: 哼……遇到困难就退缩了是吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哼……遇到困难就退缩了是吧？

Entries.DialogueText: 这年头，结婚就跟看电视一样……要是厌倦了，换个频道就完事了！我年轻的时候啊……（发牢骚）
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这年头，结婚就跟看电视一样……要是厌倦了，换个频道就完事了！我年轻的时候啊……（发牢骚）

Entries.DialogueText: 那么……老社区中心没了，是吧？不管小镇的价值观有何变化？时代这么变，都是一种耻辱……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 那么……老社区中心没了，是吧？不管小镇的价值观有何变化？时代这么变，都是一种耻辱……

Entries.DialogueText: 我不是很爱说话。尤其不喜欢跟陌生人说话。请别介意。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不是很爱说话。尤其不喜欢跟陌生人说话。请别介意。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯……貌似又是阴沉的一天。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯……貌似又是阴沉的一天。

Entries.DialogueText: 亚历克斯是我的孙子。我跟你说过吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 亚历克斯是我的孙子。我跟你说过吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 哈？没关系随意说。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哈？没关系随意说。

Entries.DialogueText: 两个男人怎么可以结婚呢？太不正常了……哼。可能是我“跟不上时代”了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 两个男人怎么可以结婚呢？太不正常了……哼。可能是我“跟不上时代”了……

Entries.DialogueText: 现在你是我们家里的一分子了。我很高兴我的孙子娶到了这么好的妻子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 现在你是我们家里的一分子了。我很高兴我的孙子娶到了这么好的妻子。

Entries.DialogueText: 我承认，我觉得……两个男人在一起太奇怪了。但是我知道你是个很棒的年轻人，而且我知道你们俩相爱了……我已经改变我的想法了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我承认，我觉得……两个男人在一起太奇怪了。但是我知道你是个很棒的年轻人，而且我知道你们俩相爱了……我已经改变我的想法了。

Entries.DialogueText: 现在你是我们家里的一分子了……我简直太骄傲了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 现在你是我们家里的一分子了……我简直太骄傲了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我现在没空聊天，小伙子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我现在没空聊天，小伙子。

Entries.DialogueText: 我现在没空聊天，小姐。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我现在没空聊天，小姐。

Entries.DialogueText: 我最喜欢的节目正演着呢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我最喜欢的节目正演着呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 所以你是位农民，是吧？至少是个本分的工作。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 所以你是位农民，是吧？至少是个本分的工作。

Entries.DialogueText: 对我来说周末和平时也没什么不同。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对我来说周末和平时也没什么不同。

Entries.DialogueText: 你退休了的话也会一样。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你退休了的话也会一样。

Entries.DialogueText: 你不冷吗？他们不再像以前那样织毛衣了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你不冷吗？他们不再像以前那样织毛衣了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我很惊讶你愿意和像我一样的老前辈做朋友。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我很惊讶你愿意和像我一样的老前辈做朋友。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好，{Farmer_Name}。想一起看电视吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好，。想一起看电视吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 我的爷爷也是农夫。这是个令人尊敬的职业。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我的爷爷也是农夫。这是个令人尊敬的职业。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果我年轻一点我就去你的农场指点你几招了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果我年轻一点我就去你的农场指点你几招了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我多希望我的腿好起来，这样就可以和亚历克斯捉迷藏了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我多希望我的腿好起来，这样就可以和亚历克斯捉迷藏了。

Entries.DialogueText: 但那已经是不可能的了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但那已经是不可能的了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我一直在想……是不是我有点太爱发牢骚了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我一直在想……是不是我有点太爱发牢骚了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我以为没人会在乎我们这些老家伙。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我以为没人会在乎我们这些老家伙。

Entries.DialogueText: 我以前是个脾气暴躁的老头子。但是现在我的脾气变得很好了。呵呵！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我以前是个脾气暴躁的老头子。但是现在我的脾气变得很好了。呵呵！

Entries.DialogueText: 保重吧，小子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 保重吧，小子。

Entries.DialogueText: 保重吧，亲爱的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 保重吧，亲爱的。

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}！别看电视了我们来聊天吧。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ！别看电视了我们来聊天吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 现在的年轻人都在玩啥？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 现在的年轻人都在玩啥？

Entries.DialogueText: 对于我的腿，我不该太悲观的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对于我的腿，我不该太悲观的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我该庆幸我还活着。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我该庆幸我还活着。

Entries.DialogueText: 到了我这个年纪就很难再适应新鲜事物了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 到了我这个年纪就很难再适应新鲜事物了。

Entries.DialogueText: 有一天你会懂的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有一天你会懂的。

Entries.DialogueText: 趁着年轻好好享受吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 趁着年轻好好享受吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 噢……太冷了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢……太冷了。

Entries.DialogueText: 年轻人就是抗冻啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 年轻人就是抗冻啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 你不喜欢是吧？呵！现在的年轻人……什么都不懂得珍惜。我又不是什么有钱人，买这个可贵了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你不喜欢是吧？呵！现在的年轻人……什么都不懂得珍惜。我又不是什么有钱人，买这个可贵了！

Entries.DialogueText: 天气也太冷了吧？日子真难熬啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 天气也太冷了吧？日子真难熬啊。

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... How am I going to reach that letter in the back? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... How am I going to reach that letter in the back?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph. I could've done it myself! And I can certainly move around on my own! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmph. I could've done it myself! And I can certainly move around on my own!

Entries.DialogueText: How feeble do you think I am?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How feeble do you think I am?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*...No, no... I'm sorry, miss. I shouldn't have gotten so angry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...No, no... I'm sorry, miss. I shouldn't have gotten so angry.

Entries.DialogueText: It was actually very kind of you to help me out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was actually very kind of you to help me out.

Entries.DialogueText: The good ol' days.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The good ol' days.

Entries.DialogueText: I've lived here too long to see this town go to ruin.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've lived here too long to see this town go to ruin.

Entries.DialogueText: You can count me in! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can count me in!

Entries.DialogueText: Grr... sounds like those raccoons are back again. Filthy varmints...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Grr... sounds like those raccoons are back again. Filthy varmints...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, you turned up at the right moment, son.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, you turned up at the right moment, son.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, you turned up at the right moment, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, you turned up at the right moment, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: Could you do an old man a favor? Could you go around the corner and scare off those raccoons for me? They've been causin' a real mess.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Could you do an old man a favor? Could you go around the corner and scare off those raccoons for me? They've been causin' a real mess.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks. Make sure you give 'em a good scare so they never come back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks. Make sure you give 'em a good scare so they never come back.

Entries.DialogueText: What's the money for, anyway? You buyin' a new purse?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's the money for, anyway? You buyin' a new purse?

Entries.DialogueText: Nnnnggghh....I just can't reach it! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nnnnggghh....I just can't reach it!

Entries.DialogueText: If only I could get up from this infernal chair... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If only I could get up from this infernal chair...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, young man.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, young man.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*...It happened 30 years ago. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...It happened 30 years ago.

Entries.DialogueText: I was working in the coal mines. We were near the end of our shift, but there was one last seam that needed to be broken up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was working in the coal mines. We were near the end of our shift, but there was one last seam that needed to be broken up.

Entries.DialogueText: I went in there aiming to set off a stick of dynamite, but my foot slipped into a crack and I dropped it. The dynamite exploded on impact.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I went in there aiming to set off a stick of dynamite, but my foot slipped into a crack and I dropped it. The dynamite exploded on impact.

Entries.DialogueText: The next thing I remember, I was laying in the hospital... and they told me I'd never walk again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The next thing I remember, I was laying in the hospital... and they told me I'd never walk again.

Entries.DialogueText: So there you have it. You probably figured I was just too old to walk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So there you have it. You probably figured I was just too old to walk.

Entries.DialogueText: Well I'll have you know that I'd be spryer than a spring chicken if I hadn't been in that accident!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well I'll have you know that I'd be spryer than a spring chicken if I hadn't been in that accident!

Entries.DialogueText: You've been very nice to me, young man. I appreciate that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been very nice to me, young man. I appreciate that.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been really nice to me, miss. I appreciate it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been really nice to me, miss. I appreciate it.

Entries.DialogueText: When you're old, you start to forget that anyone cares about you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you're old, you start to forget that anyone cares about you.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?

Entries.DialogueText: Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young man.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young man.

Entries.DialogueText: Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady.

Entries.DialogueText: Fine. I'll do what you say, doctor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fine. I'll do what you say, doctor.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? What's the meaning of all this...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? What's the meaning of all this...

Entries.DialogueText: Is this some kind of prank?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is this some kind of prank?

Entries.DialogueText: Leek... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leek...

Entries.DialogueText: My favorite... Just like Mama used to make, so many years ago...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My favorite... Just like Mama used to make, so many years ago...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph. Well...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmph. Well...

Entries.DialogueText: Well... That... Hmmph.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well... That... Hmmph.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess maybe I'm not as forgotten and ignored as I thought... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess maybe I'm not as forgotten and ignored as I thought...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, son. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, son.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, hun. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, hun.

Entries.DialogueText: You made an old man's day. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You made an old man's day.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! She thought she could fool me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! She thought she could fool me!

Entries.DialogueText: She thought she could fool me... into thinking I'm anything more than an inconvenience. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: She thought she could fool me... into thinking I'm anything more than an inconvenience.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I know better...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I know better...

Entries.DialogueText: Now, scram! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, scram!

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! You're a prankster, then?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! You're a prankster, then?

Entries.DialogueText: Hahah... You know, I was a bit of a prankster back in the day, too. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hahah... You know, I was a bit of a prankster back in the day, too.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, at least you gave me a laugh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, at least you gave me a laugh.

Entries.DialogueText: What, you think I'm going to open them?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What, you think I'm going to open them?

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! Not a chance. You think I'd fall for the old 'exploding present' gag?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! Not a chance. You think I'd fall for the old 'exploding present' gag?

Entries.DialogueText: These are going straight into the trash!
Entries.DisplayPattern: These are going straight into the trash!

Entries.DialogueText: Score!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Score!

Entries.DialogueText: Atta boy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Atta boy!

Entries.DialogueText: You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!

Entries.DialogueText: Ha! Good stuff!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ha! Good stuff!

Entries.DialogueText: Get him!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Get him!

Entries.DialogueText: Morris and his JojaMart cronies were never heard from again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Morris and his JojaMart cronies were never heard from again.

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……烟熏火鸡腿肉？我想这个庆典并没有那么糟。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……烟熏火鸡腿肉？我想这个庆典并没有那么糟。

Entries.DialogueText: 乔治快要睡着了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 乔治快要睡着了。

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……烟熏火鸡腿肉？我想这个庆典并没有那么糟。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……烟熏火鸡腿肉？我想这个庆典并没有那么糟。

Entries.DialogueText: 要不是因为这个破轮椅，我早就在迷宫里通关几百回了！ {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 要不是因为这个破轮椅，我早就在迷宫里通关几百回了！

Entries.DialogueText: 大家怎么都那么兴致勃勃的？呃……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 大家怎么都那么兴致勃勃的？呃……

Entries.DialogueText: 吃鸡蛋……不是吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 吃鸡蛋……不是吧？

Entries.DialogueText: 伊芙莉早餐做了鸡蛋和韭葱，所以我现在心情很好。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 伊芙莉早餐做了鸡蛋和韭葱，所以我现在心情很好。

Entries.DialogueText: 花？我什么花都看不见。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 花？我什么花都看不见。

Entries.DialogueText: 这里太明亮了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这里太明亮了！

Entries.DialogueText: 花有什么好的，全是大黄蜂围在那里。哼，反正我也闻不到什么味道了。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 花有什么好的，全是大黄蜂围在那里。哼，反正我也闻不到什么味道了。

Entries.DialogueText: 这音乐吵死人了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这音乐吵死人了！

Entries.DialogueText: 能不能让我静静地观海？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 能不能让我静静地观海？

Entries.DialogueText: 有韭葱大蒜土豆泥？嘿嘿……亲爱的，这里是不是天堂啊！%noturn {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有韭葱大蒜土豆泥？嘿嘿……亲爱的，这里是不是天堂啊！

Entries.DialogueText: 你干嘛这样看着我？是不是觉得我一把年纪了就不适合这种场合？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你干嘛这样看着我？是不是觉得我一把年纪了就不适合这种场合？

Entries.DialogueText: 以前我们会把它们捞起来，放进罐子里…… {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 以前我们会把它们捞起来，放进罐子里……

Entries.DialogueText: 都已经过去这么多年了啊……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 都已经过去这么多年了啊……

Entries.DialogueText: 为天上的星星庆祝？有毛病！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 为天上的星星庆祝？有毛病！

Entries.DialogueText: 我本来就是一整天跟家里人在一起，为什么要大冷天跑出来吵吵闹闹？ {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我本来就是一整天跟家里人在一起，为什么要大冷天跑出来吵吵闹闹？

Entries.DialogueText: 啊……老婆大冬天把我拽出来就是为了这玩意？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊……老婆大冬天把我拽出来就是为了这玩意？

Entries.DialogueText: 等你老了，头发掉光了，也会像我一样要戴暖和的帽子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 等你老了，头发掉光了，也会像我一样要戴暖和的帽子。

Entries.DialogueText: 这是我最喜欢的东西！谢谢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这是我最喜欢的东西！谢谢。

Entries.DialogueText: 谢谢你啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢谢你啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 真是个糟糕的礼物。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真是个糟糕的礼物。

Entries.DialogueText: 这是我见过最烂的礼物了。多谢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这是我见过最烂的礼物了。多谢。

Entries.DialogueText: 礼物？唔……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 礼物？唔……

Entries.DialogueText: 你想要什么回礼吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你想要什么回礼吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 报纸给这部评了“五星”，所以我愿意试试看。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 报纸给这部评了“五星”，所以我愿意试试看。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿！这电影真的相当不错！谢谢你邀请我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿！这电影真的相当不错！谢谢你邀请我。

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……影院跟以前不太一样了啊……不过电影应该相当好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……影院跟以前不太一样了啊……不过电影应该相当好。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿。跟现在的大多数电影相比，这还不赖。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿。跟现在的大多数电影相比，这还不赖。

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……看这个的时候我要打个盹。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔……看这个的时候我要打个盹。

Entries.DialogueText: 真是可怜！他们现在都是把什么垃圾当成“电影”的啊……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真是可怜！他们现在都是把什么垃圾当成“电影”的啊……

Entries.DialogueText: 她在嘀咕什么？我就想去那个帐篷吃点辣的东西！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 她在嘀咕什么？我就想去那个帐篷吃点辣的东西！

Entries.DialogueText: 我把值得卖的东西都拿出来了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我把值得卖的东西都拿出来了。
